from vpython import *
import time

ball = sphere(pos=vector(0,0,0), radius=0.5, color=color.red)
arrow = arrow(pos=ball.pos, axis=vector(1,0,0), color=color.cyan)

while True:
    ball.pos.x += 0.1
    arrow.pos = ball.pos
    arrow.axis = vector(0.5,0,0)
    time.sleep(0.1)
